typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceemp
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourcedept
sourceemp, sourcedept join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 pivot(columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 rank(asc(ERROR_FUNCTION(''), true),
	output({undefined} as long),
	dense: true) ~> Rank1
Rank1 window() ~> Window1
Window1 alterRow(insertIf(ERROR_FUNCTION('INS_UPD_IND=I')),
	updateIf(ERROR_FUNCTION('INS_UPD_IND=U'))) ~> AlterRow1
